evidence.text: ORDER: The joint motion ECF 2 is GRANTED. The Agreement is APPROVED and the Agreement's terms are hereby incorporated into this Order as if fully set forth herein. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 8/31/20.

extracted.value: Judge Smith granted the joint motion for entry of consent decree on 31 Aug 2020, approving the agreement.

evidence.text: ORDER APPOINTING MONITOR. James Conrad Welch is appointed the Monitor, pursuant to Paragraphs 129-30 of the Agreement. ECF 2-1. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 9/10/2020.

extracted.value: Judge Smith appointed James Conrad Welch as monitor on 10 Sep 2020.

extracted.value: Judge Smith granted the motion for Pro hac vice for Kyle Edward Smiddie on 23 Jun 2021.

evidence.text: ORDER granting 33 Motion for Pro hac vice Appointed Alyssa B Wright for UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 01/04/2023.

evidence.text: ORDER re 50 Motion to Terminate 53 Defendant's Motion to Withdraw and 55 MOTION to Terminate Sections 32-38 of the parties' Agreement. The Court ORDERS that the Joint Motion 55 is GRANTED. Sections 31-38 of the parties' Agreement is hereby TERMINATED.

extracted.value: Judge Smith granted the joint motion to terminate Sections 32-38 and withdrew the defendant's motion to withdraw, terminating Sections 31-38 on 26 Jul 2023.

evidence.text: ORDER: Plaintiff's Motion to Seal, ECF 39 is DENIED. Defendant requested that the document be filed as "Exhibit A" to the Fifth Monitor's Report, ECF 39 at 1, However, the Monitor's report makes no reference to the existence of an "Exhibit A." Therefore, the Clerk is DIRECTED to file the document as an unsealed supplement to the Fifth Monitor's Report rather than as an attachment or exhibit thereto. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 6/16/2023.

extracted.value: Judge Smith denied the plaintiff's motion to seal, ECF 39, on 16 Jun 2023.

evidence.text: ORDER- Upon consideration of the Joint Motion to Dismiss 75, it is hereby ORDERED that this action is dismissed with prejudice. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 7/31/2024.

extracted.value: Judge Smith dismissed the case with prejudice on 31 Jul 2024.

evidence.text: ORDER. With the exception of the required monitoring and periodic reporting to the court that is detailed in the Consent Decree and Settlement (ECF Nos. 5, 2, 2-1), the court DIRECTS the Clerk to close this case. Signed by District Judge Rebecca Beach Smith on 9/29/23.

extracted.value: Judge Smith directed the clerk to close the case on 29 Sep 2023.
